name: Beat Killer (nikcy, Jdas123)
description:
A rythm game beat 'em up game. 

Work against the blue collared elite and bring freedom to the streets in this combo heavy rhythm game.

Graffiti Pop
circa Early 1980s - Mid 1990s
First wave of corporate appropriation of Graffiti culture. Typically includes urban streetscapes & iconography contemporary to the time period (eg. trash cans, brick walls, chain link fencing, street lamps, sidewalks, industrial elements, general 'urban decay'). It's also associated with that eras' portrayal of street, hip hop, & punk culture.
(https://cari.institute/aesthetics/graffiti-pop)

Group Name: WorkingTitle

Nicky Schubert (Producer, Game design & Code), Zeeshan Baig, Julianna Da Silva (Art, Animation & Code), Linda Tieu (UI, Art & Code), Kyatheswar Amudhala (Music & Sound)

Sounds & Music were taken from pixabay.com and edited to fit the game.
